jobUrl.title: Individual Job URL
jobUrl.description: URL of a single job to scrape (e.g., https://thehub.io/jobs/abc123). When provided, country scraping will be skipped and only this job will be scraped. This can also be set via the JOB_URL environment variable.

countries.title: Countries
countries.description: Select one or more regions to scrape jobs from. Leave empty to scrape all regions.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler. Set to 0 for unlimited crawling.
